DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study was to observe therapeutic effects of combined resistance and aerobic exercise training (CRAE) on hyperinsulemia in obese adolescent girls. Forty obese adolescent girls (14Â±1 years) participated in this study. The participants were randomly separated into two groups; no-exercise group (n=20) and exercise group (n=20). The exercise group performed 12 weeks of CRAE.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Combined Resistance and Aerobic Exercise Training on Obesity in Adolescent Girls
DOC.criteria: Obese with Hyperinsulinemia Obese with Abdominal obesity Hypertension Pregnancy Chronic diseases Weight loss diet within the last 6 months
